name: Droid Sensorscope
Lore: 'Full-spectrum transceiver for R-unit droids including electro-photo receptors, DERs and heat and motion detectors. Data is routed directly to droids Intellex IV internal computer.',
Text: 'Deploy on one of your R-unit droids. During any control phase, you may use 1 Force to peek at the top card of opponent''s Reserve Deck. Also, if on Dagobah, droid may move for free.',
